trans-unit.source: Assists in reading in the <see langword="<browserCaps>" /> section of a configuration file and creating an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities" /> class that contains the capabilities information for the client browser.
trans-unit.target: 帮助读取配置文件的 <see langword="<browserCaps>" /> 节，并帮助创建包含客户端浏览器功能信息的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesSectionHandler> class and the corresponding `<browserCaps>` configuration section have been deprecated in the .NET Framework version 2.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesSectionHandler>类和相应`<browserCaps>`.NET Framework 2.0 版中已弃用配置节。

trans-unit.source: The preferred method for managing browser capabilities is through browser definition files that are compiled for use by the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.BrowserCapabilitiesFactory> class.
trans-unit.target: 用于管理浏览器功能的首选的方法是通过以供编译的浏览器定义文件<xref:System.Web.Configuration.BrowserCapabilitiesFactory>类。

trans-unit.source: The goal of both configuration methodologies is to generate an instance of the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> class that can be accessed from the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Browser%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: 两种配置方法的目标是生成的实例<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>从可以访问的类<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Browser%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>类。

trans-unit.source: Using the browser definition files to store browser capabilities affords advantages over the alternative.
trans-unit.target: 使用浏览器定义文件来存储浏览器功能提供了超过替代项的优势。

trans-unit.source: It offers improved performance because the browser definition information is parsed from the XML configuration file and compiled into a class ahead of time.
trans-unit.target: 它提供改进的性能，因为从 XML 配置文件分析和编译为提前类浏览器定义信息。

trans-unit.source: The browser definition files are also easier to maintain:
trans-unit.target: 浏览器定义文件也是易于维护的：

trans-unit.source: The definitions are hierarchical, and thus rely less on regular expressions to determine the browser capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 定义是分层的并因此不太正则表达式来确定的浏览器功能依赖。

trans-unit.source: The definitions can be organized in multiple files, making them easier to manage.
trans-unit.target: 定义可以组织在多个文件，使它们更易于管理。

trans-unit.source: The definitions can be defined at any level, either at the Machine.config level or a specific application level.
trans-unit.target: 定义可以在任何级别，在 Machine.config 级别或特定应用程序级别定义。

trans-unit.source: This eliminates the need to copy the entire set of definitions for the purpose of overriding the capabilities for a specific browser.
trans-unit.target: 这消除了需要复制整个组用于重写特定浏览器的功能的定义。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesSectionHandler" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesSectionHandler" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The configuration context of the current configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 当前配置文件的配置上下文。

trans-unit.source: The section of the configuration file that contains the information.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件中包含信息的节。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities" /> class that contains the capabilities information for the client browser.
trans-unit.target: 创建包含客户端浏览器功能信息的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities" /> that contains the capabilities information for the client browser.
trans-unit.target: 包含客户端浏览器功能信息的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: This class derives its browser definition data from the `<browserCaps>` configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 此类派生自从其浏览器定义数据`<browserCaps>`配置节。

trans-unit.source: This section is deprecated in the .NET Framework version 2.0.
trans-unit.target: 本部分.NET Framework 2.0 版中已弃用。
